page.shortlink: api css namespace style def class
page.description: Properties and methods in the CSS::StyleDef Class.

property.name: text_indent
property.description: The text_indent attribute specifies the indentation of the first line in a text-block.

property.name: text_align
property.description: The text_align attribute specifies the horizontal alignment of text in an element

property.name: text_decoration
property.description: The text_decoration attribute specifies the decoration added to text (overline, underline, blink etc).

property.name: text_transform
property.description: The text_transform attribute controls the capitalization of text (none, capitalize, uppercase, lowercase, inherit).

property.name: text_shadow
property.description: The text_shadow attribute controls text shadow (horizontal-size vertical-size [blur] color).

property.name: letter_spacing
property.description: The letter_spacing attribute controls the space between characters in a text.

property.name: word_spacing
property.description: The word_spacing attribute controls the white space between words.

property.name: white_space
property.description: The white_space attribute specifies how white-space inside an element is handled (normal, nowrap, pre, pre-line, pre-wrap, inherit)

property.name: color
property.description: Text color for element

property.name: background_color
property.description: background color for element

property.name: background_image
property.description: background image for element

property.name: background_repeat
property.description: repeat background image (i.e. repeat-x)

property.name: background_position
property.description: position of background image

property.name: background_attachment
property.description: Defines if the background image is fixed, or scrolls with the page (default is scroll).

property.name: background_size
property.description: background_size property

property.name: font_family
property.description: Name for font

property.name: font_size
property.description: Font size in points

property.name: font_style
property.description: Font style (i.e. italic)

property.name: font_weight
property.description: Font weight (i.e. bold)

property.name: font_variant
property.description: Specify variant of font, i.e. small-caps.

property.name: border_style
property.description: Border style for element

property.name: border_width
property.description: Width of element border

property.name: border_color
property.description: Color of border element.

property.name: border_top_style
property.description: Top border style (if different that default border)

property.name: border_top_width
property.description: Top border line width (if different that default border width)

property.name: border_top_color
property.description: Top border color (if different that the default border color)

property.name: border_left_style
property.description: Left border style (if different that default border)

property.name: border_left_width
property.description: Left border line width (if different that default border width)

property.name: border_left_color
property.description: Left border color (if different that default border)

property.name: border_right_style
property.description: Right border style (if different that default border)

property.name: border_right_width
property.description: Right border line width (if different that default border width)

property.name: border_right_color
property.description: Right border color (if different that default border)

property.name: border_bottom_style
property.description: Bottom border style (if different that default border)

property.name: border_bottom_width
property.description: Bottom border line width (if different that default border width)

property.name: border_bottom_color
property.description: Bottom border color (if different that default border)

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding on interior of element.

property.name: padding_top
property.description: Padding on interior top of element.

property.name: padding_left
property.description: Padding on interior left of element.

property.name: padding_right
property.description: Padding on interior right of element.

property.name: padding_bottom
property.description: Padding on interior bottom of element.

property.name: margin
property.description: Margin on exterior of element.

property.name: margin_top
property.description: Margin on exterior top of element.

property.name: margin_left
property.description: Margin on exterior left of element.

property.name: margin_right
property.description: Margin on exterior right of element.

property.name: margin_bottom
property.description: Margin on exterior bottom of element.

property.name: display
property.description: Define how element should be displayed (i.e. inline,table etc - how object flows)

property.name: visibility
property.description: Don't show element, even if it takes space on on the page.

property.name: float
property.description: Align an element on the page (i.e. left, right)

property.name: clear
property.description: Start new floating elements on specified side (right, left, both).

property.name: overflow
property.description: Overflow occurs when element doesn't fit (hidden, scroll, auto).

property.name: vertical_align
property.description: The vertical-align property of the element (top/bottom/%)

property.name: cursor
property.description: Cursor to display when element is hovered over.

property.name: position
property.description: Positioning to use (relative, absolute).

property.name: top
property.description: Top position of element.

property.name: left
property.description: left position of element.

property.name: right
property.description: Right position of element.

property.name: bottom
property.description: Bottom position of element.

property.name: width
property.description: Width of element, does not include padding, borders or margins.

property.name: height
property.description: Height of element, does not include padding, borders or margins.

property.name: line_height
property.description: Line height specifies the height of each line of text inside an element.

property.name: z_index
property.description: Z_index indicates the position back-to-front (the z-index with the highest value appears in front of all other elements) in the stack of elements.

property.name: list_style_type
property.description: Style of a list (unordered - disc or ordered - decimal are examples of this).

property.name: list_style_image
property.description: Optional image to specify the list marker.

property.name: list_style_position
property.description: Position of the list item marker (outside of inside the list elements).

property.name: table_layout
property.description: The table layout algorithm to use - auto = based on content, fixed = specified from table or column element width.

property.name: caption_side
property.description: Side captions appear for table (top - default, bottom - caption appears below table).

property.name: border_collapse
property.description: Do borders appear collapsed for a table, or detached.

property.name: border_spacing
property.description: Space between adjacent borders.

property.name: empty_cells
property.description: Set if empty cells should have borders.

property.name: row_span
property.description: Element should span specified number of rows.

property.name: col_span
property.description: Element should span specified number of columns.

property.name: page_break_before
property.description: Control page-break occurring before element (auto,always, avoid).

property.name: page_break_after
property.description: Control page-break occurring after element (auto,always, avoid).

property.name: page_break_inside
property.description: Control page-break occurring before element (auto, avoid) - this is a keep-together behavior.

property.name: size
property.description: Specify if size of page is absolute or relative.

property.name: marks
property.description: CSS property to set crop marks on paged media (crop/cross/none/inherit).

property.name: border_radius
property.description: Radius for rounded borders.

property.name: border_top_left_radius
property.description: Radius for rounded borders for top left corner only.

property.name: border_top_right_radius
property.description: Radius for rounded borders for top right corner only

property.name: border_bottom_left_radius
property.description: Radius for rounded borders for bottom left corner only

property.name: border_bottom_right_radius
property.description: Radius for rounded borders for bottom right corner only

property.name: box_shadow
property.description: Specify drop shadow for box. The CSS3BoxShadow helper can be used to parse/create this.

property.name: box_sizing
property.description: Allows override of the way width and height are used - content-box is the default behavior, but border-box has been added to include the border in the box size.
